name: binance-asyncapi-go-template
description: A template that generates Go WebSocket clients for Binance AsyncAPI v3 specifications.

scripts.generate: if [ -n "${AUTHOR}" ]; then AUTHOR_PARAM="--param author=\"${AUTHOR}\""; else AUTHOR_PARAM=""; fi; ${ASYNCAPI_CLI:-asyncapi} generate fromTemplate ${SPEC_FILE:-../../../../specs/binance/asyncapi/spot.yaml} ./ --output ${OUTPUT_DIR:-./output} --force-write --param server=${SERVER:-production} --param packageName=${PACKAGE_NAME:-main} --param moduleName=${MODULE_NAME:-binance-websocket-client} --param version=${CLIENT_VERSION:-0.1.0} $AUTHOR_PARAM
scripts.test: npm run test:clean && npm run test:generate && npm run test:build
scripts.test:clean: rimraf test/project/client.* test/project/go.* test/project/package.json test/project/requirements.txt test/project/Cargo.toml test/project/target test/project/models test/project/*.go
scripts.test:generate: ${ASYNCAPI_CLI:-asyncapi} generate fromTemplate ../../../../specs/binance/asyncapi/spot.yaml ./ --output test/project --force-write --param server=production --param packageName=main --param moduleName=binance-websocket-client
scripts.test:build: cd test/project && go mod tidy && go build -o client .
scripts.example: npm run test:generate && cd test/project && go run *.go

server.description: The server you want to use in the code.

moduleName.description: The Go module name for the generated client.

packageName.description: The Go package name for the generated client.

version.description: The version of the generated client package.

author.description: The author of the generated client package.
